name: Grilled Veggie & Pesto Plate
description: A vibrant and flavorful plate featuring perfectly grilled seasonal vegetables, fresh herbs, and a dollop of homemade pesto.

name: Savory Tofu Scramble Bowl
description: A light and healthy, protein-packed breakfast bowl with scrambled tofu, turmeric, and sautéed garden greens.

name: Lemon-Herb Roasted Chicken
description: Juicy chicken legs roasted with fresh lemon, rosemary, and thyme, served with blistered cherry tomatoes.

name: Tropical Fruit & Yogurt Bowl
description: A refreshing bowl of mixed tropical fruits, topped with Greek yogurt and a sprinkle of granola.

name: Salmon Quinoa Power Plate
description: A balanced meal featuring flaked salmon, mixed greens, quinoa, and a light citrus vinaigrette.

name: Spicy Asian Noodle Medley
description: Stir-fried noodles with a mix of colorful vegetables and a savory, moderately spicy sauce, served in a black bowl.

name: Classic Berry Pancakes
description: Fluffy buttermilk pancakes topped with a generous assortment of fresh mixed berries and maple syrup.

name: Chicken Fajita Wrap
description: A warm flour tortilla filled with grilled chicken strips, sautéed peppers, onions, and a touch of sour cream.

name: Hearty Lentil Soup
description: A warm, comforting, and nutrient-rich soup made with brown lentils, carrots, celery, and savory broth.

name: Avocado Toast Deluxe
description: Thick-cut sourdough toast topped with creamy mashed avocado, everything bagel seasoning, and a fried egg.
